about.title: About Us ‚Äì AvePay | Avenatec Lda
about.p1: AvePay is a multi-currency payment gateway developed by Avenatec ‚Äì Tecnologia e Comunica√ß√£o, SU, Lda, an Angolan financial technology company born to simplify, modernize, and internationalize the way people and businesses move money in Angola and worldwide.
about.p2: More than just a payment processor, AvePay is a complete financial ecosystem: it allows creating digital business accounts, sending and receiving payments in various currencies (Kwanza, USD, Euro, Pound, Real, Yuan, Rand, Naira, Yen, and even cryptocurrencies), issuing corporate cards, generating payment links, automating invoicing, and integrating with management systems and e-commerce platforms like WordPress, Shopify, Magento, and Joomla.
about.p3: With AvePay, companies, freelancers, and organizations can receive payments from national and international customers securely, quickly, and at competitive rates, without currency barriers. Our goal is to unite Africa and the world through financial technology, offering solutions that promote inclusion, efficiency, and trust in the digital environment.
about.mission_text: To facilitate and democratize access to digital, secure, and global payment solutions that drive the growth of Angolan and African businesses.
about.vision_text: To be the leading payment gateway in Africa, recognized for innovation, transparency, global integration, and support for local economic development.
values_list: Innovation: creating technological solutions with real impact.
Transparency: acting with clarity, ethics, and commitment.
Excellence: delivering performance and reliability in every operation.
services_list: Multi-currency digital accounts for companies and entrepreneurs.
Issuance of AvePay Card business cards (physical and virtual).
Integrated payment gateway for e-commerce and apps.
Digital invoicing and issuance of payment links.
Complete financial management dashboard with reports and automations.
Support for Mobile Money, QR Code, Bank Transfers, and Cryptocurrencies.
about.who_we_are_p1: Avenatec Lda is an Angolan tech startup specializing in payments, digital communication, and integrated business solutions. With offices in Luanda, it develops software, gateways, APIs, invoicing systems, e-commerce, and cloud services, aiming to position Angola as a hub of digital innovation in Africa.
about.who_we_are_p2: We believe the future of payments is global, secure, and borderless. Therefore, each AvePay solution is designed to offer freedom, scalability, and performance, adapting to the needs of startups, companies, and institutions of any size.
